name: Nebula Nitro
description: A blend of star-dusted espresso infused with cosmic cream, served chilled with a touch of intergalactic sparkle.

name: Quantum Quencher
description: A concoction of ethereal espresso, quantum foam froth, and dark matter drizzle, promising a taste beyond dimensions.

name: Celestial Chai
description: A harmonious blend of exotic spices from across the universe, brewed with stardust-infused tea leaves for an otherworldly flavor.

name: Aurora Affogato
description: A heavenly dessert beverage featuring a scoop of frozen moonbeam gelato drowned in a shot of pulsar-powered espresso.

name: Solar Flare Macchiato
description: A fiery creation of espresso with a splash of solar flare syrup, topped with a cloud of solar prominence foam.

name: Milky Way Mocha
description: A rich and indulgent blend of dark matter-infused cocoa, espresso, and cosmic cream, sprinkled with asteroid chocolate shavings.

name: Cosmic Caramel Latte
description: A smooth and sweet fusion of caramel nebula syrup, espresso, and steamed stellar milk, topped with a caramel galaxy swirl.

name: Galactic Glitter Frappuccino
description: A dazzling blend of icy star crystals, espresso, and shimmering stardust, blended to perfection for a refreshing cosmic treat.

name: Andromeda Almond Latte
description: A nutty delight featuring almond nebula syrup, espresso, and steamed milk from the celestial herds of Andromeda.

name: Space-Time Siphon
description: A mind-bending brew crafted with quantum espresso, interdimensional cream, and a dash of temporal syrup, promising a taste of eternity.

name: Nebular Nitro Cold Brew
description: A smooth and electrifying blend of cold-brewed dark matter coffee infused with nitrogen, guaranteed to send tingles down your tentacles.

name: Supernova Sipper
description: A burst of flavor awaits in this explosive concoction of espresso, cosmic caramel, and whipped cream, topped with a sprinkle of supernova dust.

name: Pulsar Punch
description: A vibrant and fruity blend of pulsar-powered espresso, cosmic fruit juices, and a splash of asteroid ice, perfect for refreshing travels through the cosmos.

name: Gravity Grind
description: An intense brew featuring dark matter espresso and gravitational whipped cream, promising a taste sensation that pulls you in.

name: Exoplanet Espresso
description: A bold and adventurous espresso shot sourced from the rarest beans harvested from distant exoplanets, delivering a taste of the unknown.

name: Orbiting Oolong
description: An exotic blend of oolong tea infused with moonbeam essence and cosmic spices, promising a tranquil journey through the celestial spheres.

name: Stellar Spice Latte
description: A warm and comforting concoction of spice-infused espresso, interstellar milk, and a sprinkle of asteroid cinnamon, perfect for cozying up on cold space nights.

name: Galactic Gingerbread Mocha
description: A festive blend of gingerbread syrup, cocoa from the far reaches of the galaxy, espresso, and frothy star milk, topped with a sprinkle of ginger asteroid crumbs.

name: Comet Caramel Macchiato
description: A heavenly blend of espresso, caramel comet drizzle, and a hint of cosmic vanilla, adorned with a shooting star of caramel.

name: Cosmos Cocoa
description: A velvety smooth cocoa blend infused with starlight and cosmic marshmallows, perfect for a cozy evening under the interstellar skies.
